name: Chicken Co0p
description:
Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam.

Controls: 

Red Chicken ---> WASD

Green Chicken ---> Arrow Keys

Objective:

Gather the hay from the piles around the yard and put all of it in the coop. Then grab the logs and stick them in the holes around the perimeter to make a fence.  The fox will attack you, but it can't hurt you, so take it easy.

Details:

I thought it fit the theme of "Joined Together" because 1. it is multiplayer, and 2. The chickens are joining forces to defend their land. I bit off more than I could chew and the game is incomplete. You can call it Chicken (Coe-Ahp) or (Coo-P), I won't be mad.

Music:

4. Skittle Soup | PublicPool | No Copyright Music
